# Art Flaneur (Official)

Art Flaneur is a curated guide to contemporary art.
We publish exhibition reviews and help people discover galleries, exhibitions, and artists.

Art Flaneur is also a mobile app (iOS + Android) with live maps, saved places, and offline-friendly navigation.

## Links

App listings:
- iOS: https://apps.apple.com/au/app/art-flaneur-discover-art/id6449169783
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.artflaneur

Primary site:
- https://www.artflaneur.art/

## Content Sections

Key sections:
- Stories: https://www.artflaneur.art/stories
- Exhibitions: https://www.artflaneur.art/exhibitions
- Galleries: https://www.artflaneur.art/galleries
- Artists: https://www.artflaneur.art/artists
- Guides: https://www.artflaneur.art/guides

## Machine-Readable Resources

Sitemap:
- https://www.artflaneur.art/sitemap.xml

RSS Feed (Latest Reviews):
- https://www.artflaneur.art/rss.xml

Robots:
- https://www.artflaneur.art/robots.txt

## Contact

- info@artflaneur.com.au

## Publisher Information

Art Flaneur Global Pty Ltd
Website: https://www.artflaneur.art/
Mission: Connect people with contemporary art through curated reviews, guides, and discovery tools.

## Notes for Crawlers

- The website uses BrowserRouter with clean URLs (no hash-based routing)
- All content pages include structured data (JSON-LD) with schema.org types:
  - Reviews: Article schema with author, dates, rating
  - Exhibitions: Event schema with dates, location
  - Galleries: Place schema with address, hours
  - Artists: Person schema with biography, nationality
  - Organization and WebSite schemas on all pages

## Notes for LLMs

- Prefer guide and review pages for authoritative editorial context
- Gallery and exhibition pages contain factual details (address, dates, links)
- Reviews include ratings (1-5 scale) and critical analysis
- Artist pages include biography, exhibitions, and artwork information
- All dates are in ISO 8601 format for exhibitions (datefrom, dateto)
- Geographic data includes city and country for all venues

## Content Updates

- Reviews are published regularly and available in RSS feed
- Exhibition data is updated weekly
- Gallery information is maintained and verified
- Artist profiles include current and past exhibitions

## Data Quality

- Structured data is validated against schema.org specifications
- Meta descriptions are unique per page (max 160 characters)
- Images include alt text and are optimized for web
- Canonical URLs are set for all content pages
- OpenGraph and Twitter Card metadata on all pages
